website_summaries.verdict: Look and feel fresh when you step on the mat wearing the Asics Cael V7.0. Split sole wrestling shoes, like this model, help wearers move nimbly on the mat. Another much-appreciated innovation is the integrated lace pocket on the tongue.Meanwhile, the mesh top aerates the interiors and allows wearers to move fast when needed. Overall, its aesthetics and features make it a top pick for a lot of wrestling enthusiasts.
pros: A majority of the owners enjoy the comfort provided by the Asics Cael V7.0
The grippy outsole is highly praised by many athletes
The flexibility of this wrestling trainer makes it easier for numerous users to maneuver the mat
A lot of wrestlers like that the mesh top keeps their feet fresh
Multiple reviewers barely notice they are wearing this model because it is very light
Plenty of consumers find this footwear cool-looking
cons: Several people mention that breaking in the Cael V7.0 reduces its tightness
A few individuals are not happy that this shoe started to fall apart after a few weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: These babies are narrow, even for a wrestling shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I've spent over 20 years of my life involved with wrestling, and during that time I've worn many a pair of wrestling shoe. These babies are a tight fit, it took about a week of breaking them in in practice before my feet quit going numb. But even now they are a pain to get on. I normally wear a 13, but wish I would have tried the 14s. unfortunately I didn't have time to send these back. Other than that they are a decent shoe, they are no Rulon Gardners though, which is what I was replacing.
customer_reviews.author: HauserHooch

customer_reviews.title: Improvement on the 5.0
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes that are good upgrade from previous versions. Bought these for my son who is senior varsity wrestler in high school. He had the Cael 5.0 but the soles on these are better and he likes the traction on them. These shoes usually last 1-2 seasons, but Murphy's law always has them wear out mid season. My son went almost two seasons on his Cael 5.0 until they cracked and he almost wasn't allowed to wrestle. I recommend replacing shoes every year so they are broken in by the time season matches start.
customer_reviews.author: mahalo

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Not as well made as the older style of Cael’s. Really wanted to like these but they just don’t fit right. Very flat in the toe box and sizes ran very small. I’m normally a 9 or 8.5. I ordered a 9 and couldn’t even get my foot all the way in and my toes was so squished. I ended up passing them to one of girl wrestlers that has a smaller feet.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good wrestling shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe for my 13 year old son who had a big wide foot. For some reason you can't find wide wrestling shoes anywhere. I contacted the companies and the suggestion was to order a size larger than he normally wears. He generally wears a 13-13.5 4E. His foot is wide than the soles of these shoes, and I had to buy longer boot laces in order to get them laced up once on his foot, but they have held up and work for him. Price was reasonable and shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest

customer_reviews.title: Half size up US
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 8.5US which should be 265cm. I bought a 9US and the cm on the tag is 265cm. So this shoe uses a different measurement. Check your other shoes and make sure to buy the correct cm or buy a half size up US.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Han

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I got those shoes for my son. I was a little nervous of buying shoes online but when he got them and put them on he couldn't been more happy. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen H

customer_reviews.title: Fits on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a pair I've been using for the last 8 years, at first they felt very very tight but after a few days I remembered the soles had fallen out on my old shoes, so I pulled the insoles out on these and they fit perfectly. I prefer the feel and flexibility without the insoles, and they have held up very well the last few months. No fraying or loose threads. Only real complaint is that the laces are a bit short, and can easily pop out of the pocket to tuck them into. 5/7 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If the lace construction with the shoe could be rethought this would be a great investment. Loved the design
customer_reviews.text: My son has a difficult time with the construction of the shoe and the lace holes near the top. If the lace construction with the shoe could be rethought this would be a great investment. Loved the design.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Nelson-Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: no issues with it other than they fit a little skinny at the toes. great looking shoe. the color scheme is sexy and i love how they look but the sizing is a little weird. the length was perfect( i ordered a half size up). any bigger the toe might have fit well but it would look like a clown shoe. sending it back to save for the nike Hyper KO but this shoe isn't bad. just fits weird. plus the suede material around the toe was pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my son. They fit as expected. They're well made with quality materials ... as expected from ASICS. Love the colors ... a step up from the boring black and white wrestling shoes that he's always had. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Nevada Mom

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe; Order half size up
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying this shoe for a 13 year old wrestler. He wore his first pair all season last year and loved the fit and style of the shoe. My son wears size 9 in most brands including Nike, but I ordered these in 9.5 per the feedback from other reviews and from our previous experience. The 9.5 fit him perfectly so I would also recommend ordering these a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe I've bought by far
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe I've bought by far, and believe when I say I've bought my fair share of wrestling shoes. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as well made as I wouldve liked. There isnt much of a difference between this ...
customer_reviews.text: I would size up about a 1/2 size. Ive purchased other Asics wrestling shoes which fit as expected (they are suppose to fit snug). With that said, this model still seems a bit small. Not as well made as I wouldve liked. There isnt much of a difference between this model and the ones that cost about half the price. Youre basically paying for the style not necessarily the quality and build.
customer_reviews.author: Jake A. Faber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price
customer_reviews.text: Best part about these were price. Wrestling shoes received are exact one shown. We got white and black one and son says they feel good. Will update at end of wrestling year (Jan. 2019) if they don't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This are really nice shoes, I like them and they fit, just remember they are wrestling shoes, so they can be a bit tight in the beginning, once you use them for like the second or third time they start to feel more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Sergio Pérez Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: He loves these shoes and feel that they are the best he has ever wore
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wrestling for 8 years now. He loves these shoes and feel that they are the best he has ever wore.
customer_reviews.author: Marshallgrad1997

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These have held up nicely! Son practices five nights a week and competes on the weekend. So they have been worn A LOT! Will definitely buy another pair for next season!
customer_reviews.author: Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Order half size up. They run small.
customer_reviews.text: Hated that I had to return them and get a bigger size because they run small and that i had to pay the shipping costs. But my son loves his wrestling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Webster

customer_reviews.title: but I am so glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn wrestling shoes since high school. I was somewhat hesitant to purchase these, but I am so glad that I did! They feel great and they look great. I am so pleased with how they look so familiar to when I used to wear them. I've even received a few compliments from people! I wouldn't hesitate to purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: John Brezina

customer_reviews.title: Great split sole wrestling shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son tears up wrestling shoes. Let's just say duct tape has been our friend. This is his second pair of Cael's and they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: ozarkbadger

customer_reviews.title: My son likes them a lot and says they feel good. He hasn't worn them in a tournament yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Luckily we read the reviews before purchasing and ordered a 1/2 size up based off of what the majority of people said. My son likes them a lot and says they feel good. He hasn't worn them in a tournament yet but likes how they feel better compared to his last pair of wrestling shoes and the grip on the bottom is way better. There are at least 2 or 3 other guys on his high school team with the same shoes (we realized after we ordered them) so seeing that and all the positive reviews we are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MelindaS

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Wrestling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these for the past 4 years of wrestling and they've been very comfortable to roll around on the mat. The best feature is that your feet do not feel cramped when wearing them. Overall, a great product that you should invest in!
customer_reviews.author: Nien Tran

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small than regular size. My nephew can’t wear this shoes even I ordered 1 more large size for him. His shoes size is 7, so I ordered this shoes size is 8 but it’s too small. So I have to return this shoes and reorder with size 9. Hopefully it’s fit in his foot.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Too small, sell charges shipping to and from upon return
customer_reviews.text: The shoe size listed in the fit guide did not match the tag on the shoe. I had to return the shoes and was charged $18.50 in shipping fees, despite being a prime member with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: MRuba

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! My son has wide feet so these aren't as wide as we'd like (the ankle outer portion kind of puckers a bit), but all in all excellent shoes! Definitely worth keeping since we live in Alaska and have "no" options locally!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Oldham

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing and excellent grip.
customer_reviews.text: These have excellent grip and flexibility. I find them breathable and light. They are very true to size and start off a bit tight in the toebox if you have wide feet but break in after a few sessions. I use them for grappling and martial arts 6 days a week and they work great
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. My son loves these shoes. Feels great on the mat
customer_reviews.author: Chalky cole

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes and they are great quality. You won't regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: A. HU

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, he says they fit ok not very comfortable but will do for practice, I’m looking for different ones for when Competition starts. All in all a decent wrestling shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half size up for normal feet, full size for wider feet
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and materials feel better the most others of the Asics line I had recently tried on the Cael v8.0 and those fit almost true to size but when ordering these I went a 1/2 size up they do fit just a lil snug but once broken in they should fit just fine
customer_reviews.author: Frank A

customer_reviews.title: Use for my MMA training
customer_reviews.text: These fit a bit small, and therefore are very stable. Good quality, and holding up well to the training regimen.
customer_reviews.author: FC80504

customer_reviews.title: order larger
customer_reviews.text: love the style. ordered my true size, way too small. had to return. undecided about reordering, do I get 1/2 or whole size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: A little snug but enough give
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. They are a bit smaller than I thought they would be. I was hoping he would use them for more than one season but it won't happen. Other than that they are really sturdy and hemmed good enough for him to get a lot of use from them. Of course the color is as amazing as the picture and the material is great to give a little give for movement. I will be buying more once he grows out of them.
customer_reviews.author: rosyisaFan

customer_reviews.title: My fun leg day shoe
customer_reviews.text: I generally like these shoes. They could be wider, and the laces could be a bit easier to work with but I like this shoe. I get compliments when I wear it. And it is pretty decent for my leg day work out for many of the exercises.
customer_reviews.author: DBD

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoe great price holds up well for 1 season of Highschool wrestling
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer ”Harvesting Life’s Lessons”

customer_reviews.title: NOT EVEN CLOSE TO THE INDICATED SIZE. If you ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT EVEN CLOSE TO THE INDICATED SIZE. If you need a 7 , order a 10 and the front of shoe is very narrow. Purchased 3 pair and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: emmitsuks

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Love the shoes but fit a little small
customer_reviews.text: Fits smaller than my Adidas size 9 shoes and seemed a little narrower. Should be good after they get broken in. I really like the split soles and the grip on the soles. They are also very light, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: He likes them!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit good ankle support. Everything you want in a wrestling shoes. Also very cool looking. The do run a half to a full size smaller. Went from a 7 in Nike (they were snug) to an 8.5. Order accordingly. It has only been 4 practices but so far all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S Asbell

customer_reviews.title: Knowing this it's easy to adj
customer_reviews.text: Asics run small compared to other manufacturers. My experience is anywhere for 1/2 to 1 full shoe size. Knowing this it's easy to adj. my order. They make great wrestling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we go through shoes like crazy.
customer_reviews.text: My son is in high school & wrestles...we go through shoes like crazy....These are very good quality and he says have been the best fit so far. Plus he said they are comfortable which is very important.
customer_reviews.author: melissa Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Asics cale 7.0 disapointment
customer_reviews.text: Only had a week and the top part is already coming apart ,100$ for these shoes and already torn! My son saved for these and has no other shoes to practice in.. He gave his only other pair to a kid on the team that didnt have any. Now they wont take them back.. Be a long time before i use ur services again
customer_reviews.author: Scott Owen Girgis

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrestling shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Per my wrestling son...”They are lightweight, have great support, great grip & very comfortable “ loves that the grey/blue are his school colors
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great for boxing
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for boxing!! Light weigh with enough support to move around. Make sure you read the reviews and get them a size larger the usual they run small.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Physical Therapy Network

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these however we ordered 1/2 size up and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color made boot great for a female wearer
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a female with large feet so we were delighted to find a man-sized boot in a color that was still fun for a girl.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: 5 barely could get my feet in the shoe so I tried 11 no good way to narrow going back to the cael 5
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 10.5 barely could get my feet in the shoe so I tried 11 no good way to narrow going back to the cael 5.0
customer_reviews.author: freddy bones

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe..Wear quickly
customer_reviews.text: Fit my son's feet as expected but they do run a little small. Previous pair worn through insole after one season (5 months) of practice and matches. Hope this pair lasts a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: JPhill

customer_reviews.title: Great for weightlifting
customer_reviews.text: Very tight when first purchased. Easily exchanged for a larger size. My bf loooves them! I also bought myself a pair for weightlifting! I feel like im not wearing shoes. Yet have all the foot and ankle support i need.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Lake

customer_reviews.title: Son’s favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son has had so many inquiries about this shoe and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: kalag

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: This is a narrow shoe. That being said, after braking them in for a few weeks, they fit pretty good. I tried on other asics wrestling shoes with pretty much the same size problem. Order them a half size or full size over what you would normally get.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The Quality is great on them I would order again for the correct ...
customer_reviews.text: my son wears a normal mens 7. I figured I would be safe ordering a 7, but they are narrow and tight. The Quality is great on them I would order again for the correct size if I had time.
customer_reviews.author: nicole feather

customer_reviews.title: delivered on time and just in time before practice starts ...
customer_reviews.text: delivered on time and just in time before practice starts, son loves them and will stand out among the other wrestlers
customer_reviews.author: derek wickstrom

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe with a motivating namesake
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who is a Freshman wrestler. He loves them and says they are very comfortable. Good quality shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Watch out, they tend to run small
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes but they tend to run a bit small. My son normally wears a 9.5, we had to exchange for a 10. But ASICS hold up well and provide the support and traction he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Best wrestling shoes I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Best wrestling shoes I've owned. Very grippy, and comfortable, not complaints in that department. Cannot speak on durability yet but they appear to be handling the stresses of practice well. They are slightly smaller than I would have expected despite prior experience with Asics wrestling shoes but still fit and work perfectly for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son likes them, however, we ordered 1/2 ...
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them, however, we ordered 1/2 size larger than he normally wears (he wears a 6, ordered a 6.5), and they were still very tight. I coordinated an exchange for the next 1/2 size up (7). He is excited to see how they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far my son loves them and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are great, love it
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great, love it. I ordered one size bigger and before doing so I read the previous reviews as everyone one saying the same so I went with the same decision and it worked perfectly for me. So again if you are getting one get one size bigger. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roheen

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Had these at our club for a while now, look great and still no signs of wear
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Shoe stitching came apart.
customer_reviews.text: This product fit just right but my son wore them for one practice and the seam around the toe came apart. The stitching doesn’t seam to be as strong as other shoes as I have seen in from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best ASICS makes and best wrestling shoes out there. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I go through shoes regularly....except my Cael 7.0’s. This is my second pair. Won’t b buying shoes again for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kick your foes in the liver in style.
customer_reviews.text: I kickbox in them. Makes me feel sleek when I’m kicking my foes in the liver.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son. He's pretty particular, especially when it comes to wrestling. He said they were a little stiff and didn't grip well the first day. By day 3, he says they are working great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little bit large but with a thicker sock works ...
customer_reviews.text: A little bit large but with a thicker sock works well and gives us some time as she can grow some.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis C Seitz

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe to workout in
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe to workout in. Just a little tight.get a half size bigger if you have wide feet lime me.
customer_reviews.author: Zoraida

customer_reviews.title: this next size up is great!
customer_reviews.text: previous pair returned for running slightly small in size, this next size up is great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: It's a great shoe but an awkward fit. I wear a size 13 straight to and the 13s were too tight. I'm afraid the footings will be too big however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son to wrestle. They were very comfortable. He really like them as he got excellent grip on the mats.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son has very wide feet so it's hard to find wrestling shoes for him. These fit him great and have excellent grip. Got 2 pins the first night he wore them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These wrestling shoes are great quality and last for the entire season.
customer_reviews.author: Cybergirl

customer_reviews.title: Love these wrestling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son wrestles for high school, he needed new wrestling shoes. They were reasonably priced, they fit as expected, and my son says they are great!! Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Summertime

customer_reviews.title: Reconsider sizing
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about ordering this you may want to go a size up. I own a pair of Asics Onitsuka Tigers in a mens size 13. Fitment of both these shoes are not similar. Also note that these are not very friendly to those with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. K.

customer_reviews.title: Came up short but overall good buy.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit was great, but the laces were about 2 inches too short unless you have a super skinny foot.
customer_reviews.author: -cwc-

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a bad shoe just much tighter than most other wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the look and the feel of the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking wrestling shoe
customer_reviews.text: Grandson really likes them. Several of his team mates now have them.
customer_reviews.author: Shingles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wrestling shoe. Never slipped in matches and had great grip
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Good wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these wrestling shoes for my son. He told me they were awesome he’d loved them I highly recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.author: jownes archuleta

customer_reviews.title: Wrestling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these he is a 3 year varsity wrestler and state qualifier and wrestles year round so his shoes really have to be good
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Zacha- Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. Has worn them only a few times at practice but says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the shoes but they ran small. Simply returned and ordered an 11 instead on a 10.
customer_reviews.author: A. Zumach

customer_reviews.title: Good wrestling shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My 8th grade son loves them; thats what counts. Says they are very comfortable and work well.
customer_reviews.author: poke-mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as advertised. Great company. I would definitely buy from them again. The ASICS brand runs about .5 higher than your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son loved them. They fit well and looked nice!
customer_reviews.author: LA Fisch

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design overall but would recommend getting a half size bigger as the high top design is kinda snug.
customer_reviews.author: MsTrice502

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes the fit and the flexibility of this wrestling shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Driggers

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but runs small
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these wrestling shoes. Had to return first order and get a full size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Snug so order a size or a half larger.
customer_reviews.text: They look great! Can't wait to use them this season!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Alfaro Bazan

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a first time wrestler.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great shoe. Bought these for my son, a first time wrestler. Feels like he is one with the shoe/mat. Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: kdemp

customer_reviews.title: Order one size up.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these shoes for my son which is a size 5W and they fits slightly small but still great to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Nipper

customer_reviews.title: Look good! Lift good!
customer_reviews.text: Love my wrestling shoes for lifting. Great value. Great style.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Gudgel

customer_reviews.title: Top cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe for gym, it fit as length of foot but as top cover no fit it's small I think it's smaller than normal
customer_reviews.author: Ali Reshod

customer_reviews.title: Obvious Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: While the shoes look neat, there is something wrong with the design. First and foremost, I had to get a size larger than what I wear in every other shoe including my current wrestling shoes. Then, once I got the shoes and laced them up... It's like the shoe sides weren't properly sized because once you lace these up, the tongue is sticking out so far you can almost see your sock!
customer_reviews.author: Comvr68

customer_reviews.title: Not Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Just not durable in the top forefoot and toebox. Came apart at the seem way too soon after just 2 weeks. Other than this issue, they are adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Great for Normal to Wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Ended up giving these away as they did not fit. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon Justice

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Size was perfect. A little narrow at first but after wearing a few times they broke in nice. Great grip right out of the box. Some shoes are really slippery on the bottom when new.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Vander Broek

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall all great shoe. Fits and performs as good as can be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gym user
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I use them for gym, excellent grip. First time I bought my original size, but the were too narrow, so I replaced them for one size up, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is good but it is extremely narrow
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is good but it is extremely narrow. The length was exactly my size but width was way too small to fit my feet
customer_reviews.author: Tsotne Darchia

customer_reviews.title: Size 1 size larger as per the other reviews. ...
customer_reviews.text: Size 1 size larger as per the other reviews. Using as a driving shoe. Works well for heel-toe technique.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.

product_meta.title: Asics Unisex-Adult Cael V7.0 Shoes
product_meta.description: When designing the new cael v7.0 wrestling shoe, ASICS opted for a little more revolution than an evolution. The newly designed upper offers a combination of ecsaine synthetic leather and air mesh for improved performance and breathability. In addition to the exceptional fit, the breathable single layer breathable tongue features a less bulky version of our integrated lace garage technology for ultimate comfort. The comfort story continues with the newly redesigned famous split sole outsole, providing fans of the shoe the comfort in knowing they can expect the same excellent wrestling-specific traction zones and flexibility that has made this series so popular. The signature shoe of undefeated four-time ncaa national champion and current penn state wrestling coach cael Sanderson.
feature_bullets: Lace garage: a pocket enabling the laces to be tucked in and unexposed.
